name: Delicious Fish With Cream Sauce
desc: A fish dish served in sauce. The translucent fillet lies upon exquisite cream sauce. With only a small mouthful, one might even see fish leaping on the sea surface.

customize.name: Recipe: Fish With Cream Sauce
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Fish With Cream Sauce.

customize.name: Fish
customize.desc: A fresh fillet of fish. Handled properly, it can make a rich dish.

customize.name: Milk
customize.desc: Sweet and fragrant cow's milk. Don't waste a single drop, not even that one rolling down your chin.

customize.name: Mint
customize.desc: A refreshingly cool ingredient. The cool, fresh flavor can cut through the heat of many dishes.

customize.name: Fish With Cream Sauce
customize.desc: A fish dish served in sauce. Fresh fish filets were dried before pan-fried until crispy, then drizzled with a creamy white dressing and sprinkled with fresh mint. A unique dish that can be made through the simplest methods.

customize.name: Suspicious Fish With Cream Sauce
customize.desc: A fish dish served in sauce. The outside was burnt in searing hot oil. It is rather hard not to notice the sharp contrast between the charcoal-black fish and the milk-white sauce. Only the meat inside seems edibleâ€¦ Wait, what's with this sourness?

value.text: Restores 22% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 470 HP every 5s for 30s.
